title: 17.5p land with solidly built two storied house @ Mirihana
details:
17.5p land with solidly built two storied house for sale at Mirihana, Nugegoda
Facing 20 ft wide access road
Spacious sitting and dinning area
6 bed rooms with 4 bathrooms
Separate servant quarters
Can be used as two separate units
Highly residential area
Peaceful surrounding
